court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN SC 560/2019 OF ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT - IV, KOZHIKODE CRIME NO.500/2009 OF Kunnamangalam Police Station , Kozhikode PETITIONER/ACCUSED: JESEER, AGED 36 YEARS S/O. ABDHUL KALAM, KUMULLA
full_text: Bl ie al ieee Oe 2020/KER/549 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cri.MC.No.8812 OF 2019 (B) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN SC 560/2019 OF ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT - IV, KOZHIKODE CRIME NO.500/2009 OF Kunnamangalam Police Station , Kozhikode PETITIONER/ACCUSED: JESEER, AGED 36 YEARS S/O. ABDHUL KALAM, KUMULLAMKUZHIYIL (H), KUNNAMANGALAM P. O., M.L.A.ROAD, KOZHIKODE DT. - 673 570. BY ADV. SRI.M.MUHAMMED SHAFI RESPONDENTS/STATE AND DE-FACTO COMPLAINANT : 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2 RAJESH KUMAR, AGED 28 YEARS S/O. UKKU NAIR, PULLOTTU HOUSE, P. O. KUNNAMANGALAM, KOZHIKODE DT.- 673570. 3 RAMESH KUMAR, AGED 43 YEARS S/O. UKKU NAIR, PULLOTTU HOUSE, P. O. KUNNAMANGALAM, KOZHIKODE DT. - 673570. 4 MUHAMMED RIYAS, AGED 44 YEARS S/O. MUHAMMED KOYA, KAITHAKKUZHIYIL HOUSE, P. O. KUNNAMANGALAM, KOZHIKODE DT. - 673570. R2-4 BY ADV. SMT.T.RASINI SRI. RAMESH CHAND, P.P THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: BLE Bea 2020/KER/549 Crl.MC.No.8812 OF 2019(B) 2 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January 2020 The petitioner is the 4" accused in Crime No.500/2009 of Kunnamangalam Police Station, for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 324, 308 r/w Section 149 of the IPC. 2. The petitioner was absconding and the parent case proceeded against the remaining accused, while the case against the petitioner/accused was refiled as SC No.560/2019 and is presently pending on the files of the Additional District and Sessions Court-IV, Kozhikode. The petitioner has amicably settled the dispute with the defacto complainant and the injured who are respondent Nos.2 to 4. They have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled and that they BLE oe 2020/KER/549 Crl.MC.No.8812 OF 2019(B) 3 do not have any grievance against the petitioner at present. Even though, Section 308 has been incorporated, the injuries are not life threatening. A report has been called for from the Investigating Officer through the senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioner does not have any criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result the Crl.M.C is allowed, and the entire proceedings against the petitioner in SC WNo.560/2019 on the files of the Additional District and Sessions Court-IV, Kozhikode, stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.P.C and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE SPK Bl ie al ieee BRA 2020/KER/549 Crl.MC.No.8812 OF 2019(B) 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al TRUE COPY OF THE CHARGE ALONG WITH THE FIR IN NO.500/2009 OF KUNNAMANGALAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A2 AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 11.11.2019. ANNEXURE A3 AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT DATED 11.11.2019. ANNEXURE A4 AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 4TH RESPONDENT DATED 11.11.2019. RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COoPY// PA TO JUDGE
